NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
OENO: Daz, the construction of the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> has been going swimmingly thanks to your help! Your new voyager stones are a truly revolutionary piece of technology.
2 1
OENO: However, during our time voyaging, I encountered some.. strange occurrences which I would like to inquire about.
3 2
OENO: To start: while working in shifts with Coleus, I noticed consistently being transported some distance outside of the projection pool when voyaging into the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color>.
4 3
OENO: In the dark, this has caused me to stumble off the tiny island more times than I wish to admit! Is this an intended feature, or some strange quirk of the voyager stone?
5 2
OENO: More distressingly: shortly into our work, Coleus mentioned that he began to receive.. visions from my voyage - down to the exact detail of everything I saw.
6 5
OENO: I understand that the voyager stones work using the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project's</color> memory storage systems.
7 6
OENO: Could there perhaps ahve been some sort of mix-up between our memory masks from using the same voyager stone?
8 7
OENO: We have decided to stop our work for some time until these issues can be amended.. I would deeply appreciate if you could investigate these issues, Daz!
Workshop R3 5
